name: MEC 350mm Pro Carbon Seat Post (15mm Offset)
description: A carbon fibre seat post to smooth out the ride. The one-piece construction is strong and crazy light.Carbon shaft and head with aluminum clamps.Compatible with standard and 7 x 9mm saddle rails.Diameters: 27.2, and 31.6mm.Torque saddle rails to 6nm.Torque seatpost clamp to 5nm.
